recommendations: Asitava Chanda, CFA, FRM “I went to my alma mater (IIT KGP) on our 25th reunion. The Student's Alumni Committee (SAC) comprising primarily second year undergraduate students organised it. The two day event was methodically structured and skillfully coordinated by the SAC members. Multiple issues related to transport and logistics, food, accommodation and the events were handled with aplomb. Dhwanit was in charge of the Musical Night and transport and he discharged his duties with all sincerity. I hope he continues with this level of enthusiasm and wish him all the best.”
